title: Issue a Building Code Citation
description: A building inspector has found a violation during an inspection and needs to issue a citation.

tasks.description: Identify the property and the specific code violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector correctly identifies the property and the violation details.

tasks.description: Generate a formal citation document, including the code reference, a description of the violation, and the required corrective action.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector creates a complete and accurate citation.

tasks.description: Issue the citation to the property owner and log it in the enforcement system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector delivers the citation and records it in the system.
